Fortunately, VICE GRIP could do both.  Gesturing over to DRILL BIT, "=
Come with me, we're going down."  Giving instructions to DINOBOT, "Go up to=

We're going to keep on digging and trying to track the souce."

With that, =
the two would head towards it while DINOBOT went up towards the surface to =
